title: Monster Beverage Buys Owner of Craft Breweries Cigar City, Oskar Blues for $330 Million
sub_head: Energy-drink maker enters beer, hard-seltzer business with purchase of CANarchy Craft Brewery Collective
body:
Monster Beverage Corp. has been mulling a move into booze for years. It finally took the plunge Thursday, becoming the latest big soft-drink company to try its hand at alcoholic beverages.
Monster, best known for its namesake energy drinks, said it had forged a deal to buy craft-beer and hard-seltzer company CANarchy Craft Brewery Collective LLC for $330 million.
